origin.phoenix.phoenix.name: Phoenix
origin.phoenix.phoenix.description: Flying from the pages of mythology, the phoenix is a legendary firebird that can never truly die.
power.phoenix.ascent.name: Ascent
power.phoenix.ascent.description: You are able to launch yourself into the air. Only available in Normal Form.
power.phoenix.fiery_death.name: Fiery Death
power.phoenix.fiery_death.description: Your body sets the ground on fire when you die.
power.phoenix.flight.name: Flight
power.phoenix.flight.description: You have fiery wings. Only available in Normal Form.
power.phoenix.gliding.name: Gliding
power.phoenix.gliding.description: You gain slow falling and jump boost. Only available in Reborn Form.
power.phoenix.golden_diet.name: Golden Diet
power.phoenix.golden_diet.description: All foods restore very little hunger and saturation, except for golden foods, which function like normal.
power.phoenix.helios_blessing.name: Helios' Blessing
power.phoenix.helios_blessing.descriptio: When under direct sunlight, you receive a speed boost on land and in the air.
power.phoenix.radiant_call.name: Radiant Call
power.phoenix.radiant_call.description: Fully heals every player and mob within a 12 block radius.
power.phoenix.radiant_call_active.name: Radiant Call
power.phoenix.radiant_call_active.descri: Fully heals every player and mob within a 12 block radius.
power.phoenix.rebirth.name: Rebirth
power.phoenix.rebirth.description: In your Normal Form, you have 5 hearts and can use Flight and Ascent. If you lose all 5 hearts, you shrink to your Reborn Form. This form is 1 block tall, can use Glide, and has only 3 hearts. You return to Normal Form upon Rejuvenation or death.
power.phoenix.rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
power.phoenix.rejuvenation.description: At sunrise, if you were in your Reborn Form, you will return to Normal Form.
power.phoenix.water_weakness.name: Water Weakness
power.phoenix.water_weakness.description: You have decreased speed in water.
